questionText: Which Disney film features the song 'When You Wish Upon a Star'?

What is A113 in relation to Pixar?
options: A classroom at CalArts where many animators studied
The code name for Pixar's first computer
The building number of Pixar's first office
The lunch room at Pixar studios
correctAnswer: A classroom at CalArts where many animators studied
